oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The current agri-policy context: The European Action Plan for Organic Farming and the current CAP Reform
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Stolze, Matthias
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
Europe
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The presentation highlights current developments of European agricultural policy related to organic farming, particularly the CAP Reform 2006 and the European Action Plan for Organic Food and Farming
